kv12.4:1.3_0: Sukhavedaniyaṁ dukkhavedaniyaṁ …pe… sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:1.5_0: nanu na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:1.7_0: Hañci na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv12.4:2.4_0: Cakkhāyatanaṁ vipāko, cakkhāyatanaṁ sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:3.1_0: Cakkhāyatanaṁ vipāko, cakkhāyatanaṁ na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:4.6_0: Sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:4.8_0: nanu na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:4.10_0: Hañci na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv12.4:5.4_0: Kāyāyatanaṁ vipāko, kāyāyatanaṁ sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:5.6_0: kāyāyatanaṁ vipāko, kāyāyatanaṁ na sukhavedaniyaṁ …pe… anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv12.4:6.6_0: Hañci saḷāyatanaṁ kammassa katattā uppannaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
